articles.title: `Please die`, `you are a stain on the universe,` AI chatbot tells girl seeking help for homework - WION
articles.description: A student in America asked an artificial intelligence program to help with her homework. In response, the app told her "Please Die." The eerie incident happened when 29-year-old Sumedha Reddy of Michigan sought help from Google’s Gemini chatbot large language…
